videos.headline: Desmond Trotter shines vs. So. Miss
videos.description: Desmond Trotter throws for 299 yards and two touchdowns in a 31-21 victory over Frank Gore Jr. and Southern Miss on the road.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Desmond Trotter shines vs. So. Miss) 2020/09/03 ESHEET SOTFULL
